cause.description:
Like an awards show for social change, we're going to have fun and raise money for the Drum Major Institute. You're invited to come hang out with other New Yorkers committed to creating social change at the Drum Major for Justice Awards.
Want this badge? All the cool kids are rocking one.
Author and PBS talk show host Tavis Smiley will be honored for being an outstanding voice for social change in the news media and beyond. Mayor Mike Bloomberg will be honored for PlaNYC, his sweeping plan to make New York City a model for environmentally sustainable cities in the 21st century. Dr. Cornel West and Rev. Dr. James A. Forbes, Jr. will be presenting the Drum Major for Justice Awards. Show your support by joining the cause. Really show your support by buying a ticket (activist tickets are $50) at http://drummajorinstitute.org/benefit/ 1. That no one likes rubber chicken. 2. That everyone likes a good party. 3. That you should spend at least one night celebrating the work the Drum Major Institute does all year long.
cause.mission: To provide the ideas that fuel the progressive movement.
